titles.title: Jesus Christ Who Came to Save
Jesus Christ Today is Risen, Jesus Christ Our Savior True, Jesus Christ, Our Blessed Savior

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus Christ, who came to save, And overcame the grave, Is now arisen, And sin hath bound in prison. Kyri' eleison.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Who withouten sin was found, Bore our transgression's wound. He is our Savior, And brings us to God's favor.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Life and mercy, sin and death, All in His hands He hath; Them He'll deliver, Who trust in Him forever.
